long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your web browsing experience with Ctrl+F AI, the ultimate search enhancement tool for your browser!

Tired of endless scrolling and basic text searches? Ctrl+F AI revolutionizes how you find information on web pages. This powerful extension combines traditional search functionality with cutting-edge AI technology to deliver an unparalleled search experience.

Key features:
1. AI-Powered Question Answering: Go beyond simple keyword matching. Chat with the website, and let our advanced AI provide you with accurate, context-aware answers.

2. Easy Data Extraction: Easily extract the content on the website to JSON or CSV format without leaving the tab.

3. Seamless Integration: Activate Ctrl+F AI with the familiar Ctrl+F (or Cmd+F) shortcut, making it a natural part of your browsing workflow.

4. User-Friendly Interface: Our sleek, intuitive design allows for easy navigation between search results and AI-generated answers.

5. Privacy-Focused: Your searches and questions are processed securely, ensuring your browsing data remains private. We don't save any of the content anywhere. It's only passed around to get the answers you're looking for. 

Whether you're a student researching for an essay, a professional analyzing reports, or just someone who wants to find information faster, Ctrl+F AI is your perfect companion. It saves time, reduces frustration, and helps you extract valuable insights from web content with ease.

Don't just search - search smarter.
